fullDescription.intro:
This node utilizes the Apache Spark collaborative filtering implementation.
Notice: The matrix factorization model contains references to Spark RDDs and thus is not selfcontained. The referenced Spark RDDs will be deleted, like any other Spark RDD generated in KNIME, when the node is reseted or when the workflow is closed if the "Delete Spark RDDs on dispose" option is enabled for the current Spark Context.
fullDescription.option: The user column. Supports only integer columns.

Is a parameter applicable to the implicit feedback variant of ALS that governs the baseline confidence in preference observations.

The number of iterations to run.
The number of blocks used to parallelize computation (set to -1 to auto-configure).
Select this option to use the ALS variant adapted for implicit feedback data otherwise the explicit feedback ALS variant is used.
